verses.kjv: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone;
verses.ct: So when we couldn't stand the uncertainty any longer, we decided it was best to stay behind in Athens by ourselves.

verses.kjv: And sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:
verses.ct: We sent Timothy, our brother and God's servant who works alongside us in spreading the good news of Christ, to strengthen you and encourage you in your faith.

verses.kjv: That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.
verses.ct: We didn't want anyone to be shaken by these hardships, because you know very well that this is what we were destined for.

verses.kjv: For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.
verses.ct: Truly, when we were still with you, we warned you ahead of time that we would face suffering â€” and that's exactly what happened, as you know.

verses.kjv: For this cause, when I could no longer forbear, I sent to know your faith, lest by some means the tempter have tempted you, and our labour be in vain.
verses.ct: That's why, when I couldn't wait any longer, I sent Timothy to find out how your faith was holding up. I was afraid that the tempter might have gotten to you and that all our hard work would have been for nothing.

verses.kjv: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us, and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity, and that ye have good remembrance of us always, desiring greatly to see us, as we also to see you:
verses.ct: But Timothy has just now returned to us from visiting you, and he brought wonderful news about your faith and love. He told us that you always think of us fondly and that you long to see us just as much as we long to see you.

verses.kjv: Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith:
verses.ct: Because of this, brothers and sisters, your faith has been a tremendous comfort to us through all our own troubles and hardships.

verses.kjv: For now we live, if ye stand fast in the Lord.
verses.ct: It gives us new life knowing that you are standing firm in the Lord.

verses.kjv: For what thanks can we render to God again for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;
verses.ct: How could we ever thank God enough for you? The joy we feel because of you in God's presence is overwhelming.

verses.kjv: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face, and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?
verses.ct: Night and day we pray intensely that we might see you in person and supply whatever is still missing in your faith.

verses.kjv: Now God himself and our Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way unto you.
verses.ct: May God our Father himself, and our Lord Jesus Christ, clear the way for us to come to you.

verses.kjv: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we do toward you:
verses.ct: May the Lord cause your love to grow and overflow toward one another and toward everyone else, just as our love does toward you.

verses.kjv: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.
verses.ct: May he make your hearts strong and blameless in holiness in the presence of God our Father, when our Lord Jesus Christ returns with all his holy ones.
